page.title: 05CHANGING TIMES
page.content: MANY THINGS HAVE CHANGED SINCE 1900 INCLUDING PEOPLE AND BUILDINGS. FOR INSTANCE THE GARAGE USED TO BE A BLACKSMITHS AND A DUSTY OLD ROOM USED TO BE A COBBLERS. ALSO AN OLD HOUSE DOWN THE ROAD WAS A CREAMERY. DRUMARD SCHOOL,BUILT IN 1953, WAS ONLY SUPPOSED TO LAST A NUMBER OF YEARS IT IS STILL HERE IN 1985! MRS. PORTER OUR SCHOOL COOK HAS LIVED IN OUR SQUARE FOR 51 AND-A-HALF YEARS. SHE THINKS HOUSING AND AGRICULTURE HAS IMPROVED OVER THE YEARS. SHE VERY MUCH LIKES WHERE SHE LIVES BECAUSE HER NEIGHBOURS ARE FRIENDLY.
